name: Cebu Taoist Temple
description: This temple had become popular because of its artistic structures. Even non-believers of the Taoism religion pay visit to the place. From there, you can see the striking view of the city and even the Mactan Island. And, of course, for Taoists, this is the ideal place to pray or meditate.
more_info: Opening Hours : Typically open daily from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
Best Time to Visit : Early morning or late afternoon for cooler temperatures and less crowd.

name: 10000 Roses Cafe
description: A beautiful cafe featuring thousands of LED roses that light up the night, creating a magical atmosphere. Perfect for evening outings and photo ops.
activities: relax in the cozy cafe environment
more_info: Opening Hours : Daily from 4:00 PM to 10:00 PM.
Admission Fee : Entrance is free, but purchases are required at the cafe.

name: Kawasan Falls
description: Kawasan Falls is a stunning multi-tiered waterfall located in the lush jungle of Badian, Cebu. The falls are known for their turquoise blue waters and scenic surroundings, making it a popular spot for swimming and canyoning.
activities: Enjoy swimming in the cool, clear waters
take a bamboo raft ride close to the falls
go canyoning for an adventurous experience.
more_info: Opening Hours: Daily from 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
Admission Fee: PHP 50 per person for entrance.
Best Time to Visit: Early morning to avoid crowds and enjoy the peaceful ambiance.

name: Osme√±a Peak
description: Osema Peak offers breathtaking panoramic views of the surrounding landscapes and is a popular hiking destination. The trail is well-maintained and leads to a scenic viewpoint where you can see the coastline and nearby islands.
more_info: Opening Hours: 6:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
Admission Fee: PHP 100 per person.
Best Time to Visit: Early morning or late afternoon for cooler temperatures and clearer views.

name: Pescador Island
description: Pescador Island is renowned for its crystal-clear waters and vibrant marine life. It's a popular spot for snorkeling and diving, offering a glimpse into the underwater world teeming with colorful coral reefs and exotic fish.
more_info: Opening Hours: 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
Admission Fee: PHP 200 per person.
Best Time to Visit: November to May for calm seas and clear visibility.

name: Oslob Whale Sharks
description: Oslob Whale Sharks is one of the best places to experience up-close encounters with these gentle giants. Visitors can swim and snorkel with whale sharks in their natural habitat, making it a must-visit destination for marine enthusiasts.
activities: Snorkeling, whale shark watching, and photography.
more_info: Opening Hours: 6:00 AM to 12:00 PM daily.
Admission Fee: PHP 1,000 for snorkeling with whale sharks.
Best Time to Visit: March to June for optimal whale shark sightings and calm sea conditions.

name: Sumilon Island Sandbar
description: Sumilon Island Sandbar is a pristine white sandbar located off the coast of Sumilon Island. It is known for its crystal-clear waters and stunning views, making it a perfect spot for swimming, snorkeling, and sunbathing.
more_info: Opening Hours: 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM daily.
Admission Fee: PHP 500 for day access to the island.
Best Time to Visit: November to May for the best weather and clear water.

name: Camotes Island
description: Camotes Island is known for its beautiful beaches, clear waters, and serene ambiance, making it an ideal spot for relaxation and water activities.
more_info: Best Time to Visit: November to May for calm seas and clear skies.

name: Cebu Safari and Adventure Park
description: Cebu Safari and Adventure Park is the largest zoological park in the Philippines, featuring a wide range of wildlife and thrilling adventure activities.
more_info: Opening Hours: 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
Admission Fee: PHP 800 per person.

name: Cebu Ocean Park
description: Cebu Ocean Park is a large marine-themed park featuring aquariums, animal shows, and interactive activities, offering a fun and educational experience for visitors.
more_info: Opening Hours: 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
Admission Fee: Starting at PHP  790.09. per person.

name: Anjo World Theme Park
description: Anjo World Theme Park is the largest theme park in Cebu, offering various thrilling rides and attractions for both kids and adults.
more_info: Opening Hours: 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM.
Admission Fee: PHP 600 per person.

name: Bojo River Aloguinsan
description: Bojo River in Aloguinsan is famous for its eco-tourism river cruise, where you can enjoy the scenic views of mangroves and wildlife while learning about the local ecosystem.
more_info: Opening Hours: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
Admission Fee: PHP 300 per person.

name: Mantayupan Falls
description: Mantayupan Falls is one of Cebu's tallest waterfalls, offering visitors a peaceful escape into nature with its refreshing water and lush surroundings.
more_info: Best Time to Visit: June to February for the full flow of the waterfall.

name: Ogtong Cave
description: A hidden gem with a natural underground pool where you can swim in cool, fresh water inside a cave.
more_info: The resort offers ocean views.
Cave is located within Ogtong Cave Resort.

name: Kota Beach
description: A famous shoreline that offers thrilling activities like paddleboarding, kayaking, and island hopping to nearby islets.
more_info: Best time to visit during sunrise or sunset.
Calm waters ideal for water sports.

name: Virgin Island (Silion Island)
description: A small, untouched island perfect for snorkeling, cliff diving, and exploring vibrant marine life.
more_info: Accessible via a 30-minute boat ride from Bantayan Island.
Popular island-hopping destination.

name: Virgin Island (Silion Island)
description: A small, untouched island perfect for snorkeling, cliff diving, and exploring vibrant marine life.
more_info: Accessible via a 30-minute boat ride from Bantayan Island.
Popular island-hopping destination.

name: Lapu-Lapu Monument
description: A towering bronze statue honoring the legendary Filipino hero, Lapu-Lapu, who famously defeated Ferdinand Magellan in the Battle of Mactan.
more_info: Take photos with the imposing statue.
Learn about the historical significance of the Battle of Mactan.
Explore the surrounding area, which offers beautiful views of the ocean.

name: TOPS Cebu: A Breathtaking View of the Cityscape
description: A popular tourist spot offering panoramic views of Cebu City and its surrounding areas.
activities: Dine at restaurants with scenic views
Capture stunning photos of the skyline
more_info: Best time to visit is during sunset for breathtaking views.
Consider dining at one of the restaurants for a memorable experience.
Dress comfortably, especially if you plan to spend time outdoors.

name: Maravilla Beach
description: A beautiful beach known for its white sand and clear waters, perfect for swimming, sunbathing, and water sports.
moreInfo: Best to visit during the dry season (December to May).
Bring necessary beach essentials like sunscreen, towels, and hats.
Respect the environment and avoid littering.
